html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02842018-03-12,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LISA M. BROWNE of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Marsha Sobey, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LISA M. BROWNE of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Marsha Sobey, whose term has expired.
